MemoryInfobox.description: 'Finding a letter written by the hand of a Followers of Ares|Follower of Ares and telling of a cache of loot hidden outside a village, Kassandra set off to claim the valuables for herself.'

General_Description: '''Zealot's Cache''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the corpse of a [[Followers of Ares|Follower of Ares]], Kassandra discovered a note detailing the location of the zealot's valuables.
Section_Messages: *''I made the villagers give up any valuables to the Followers. The loot is outside the village for you. They'll think twice next time they complain about us!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the location and claimed the valuables for herself.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
